Reviews.Title: This package is a bargain
Reviews.Author: chel
Reviews.Content: This package is a bargain. For about the cost of the filters and one lens at my local retailer, this package is everything someone needs to get started or take their photography to the next level. The company was great to work with. A package was well-packed, and the items as promised. There were a couple little things missing, which the company shipped that same day. I am very happy with the package and the seller.

Reviews.Title: Takes too long to get , and only half the Product at a time
Reviews.Author: Juls
Reviews.Content: My Husband was very happy When we received all the Items, I ordered this on Dec-16 and Received part of the order on the 26th of Dec had to call the Company and ask where the rest of the order was, it then took another 10 days to get. When I Originally placed the Order it stated 3-5 days, Had I known it would have taken longer I would have shipped differently , Then to only get half the order, well it just kinda messed up the Christmas gift,  Again, getting it after the Fact and only half the gift, then again waiting another 10 days for the rest of the Order.

Reviews.Title: decent package but not exact
Reviews.Author: michael sweet
Reviews.Content: Most the stuff in the package are as said although one piece does not list the D5200 camera. And as others have said the 32GB memory card wasn't in the package. Still waiting to see of they're gonna send it. All the lenses and other accessories however fit and seem to be just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great package for the beginners and professionals.
Reviews.Author: swati
Reviews.Content: It was worth a spending on thanksgiving. The package consist of everything i might need for semi professional photography. the product was well packaged and shipped on time. The service was awesome. I checked the individual prices of the equipment on various online retailers and found the worth of package is at least 1.5 times of what i had paid.In few words...really satisfied with the product at first place. Will lookout for its robustness in near future.

Reviews.Title: A lot of basic stuff for the money!
Reviews.Author: Dale E. Williams Jr.
Reviews.Content: This bundle has more stuff in it than someone starting out will use. I have found that the more I use my Nikon D5300 the more I am happy with this package. The only thing I did not like was the bag is to small to hold all of it, but I can live with needing a bigger bag.

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: supergoloso
Reviews.Content: Missing items on the kit need to send every think what the picture showI  waiting for the rest of the kitRemote controlAnd the neck strap

ProductInfo.Features:
This Package Includes EVERYTHING You Need to Get Started With Your Nikon D5100 or D5200 Digital SLR Cameras & More!
With This Package You Can Take Your Photographing Experience To a Whole New Level
All Of Your Accessories In ONE Package
Includes SSE Bluetooth Soundbox
Lenses and Filters Work With Nikon 18-55mm, Nikon 55-200mm & Nikon 35mm f/1.8G DX Lenses
ProductInfo.Name: The EVERYTHING YOU NEED Package for Nikon D5100, Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Cameras. Includes: Wide Angle & Telephoto Lenses, Filters, Batteries, Flash, Tripod, Monopod, Case, 32GB Memory Card, Dual Neck Strap & Much Much More!
